links.title: Record Sums of Money Flood Into Private Capital
links.description: Almost every strategy in private capital is sitting on record amounts of money ready to be deployed, looking for something to buy, according to data provider Preqin. Private equity: a record $1.14 trillion. Real estate: a record $294 billion. Infrastructure: a record $173 billion. Private debt: a record $281 billion.

links.title: Two Dow stocks and one 'FANG' giant could be buys amid the tech sector volatility
links.description: Technology stocks roared higher Friday as the market's best-performing sector after posting substantial losses over the two prior sessions. Amid the choppy price action, two leading Wall Street experts recommended which tech names they see as solid bets.

links.title: JP Morgan's widely followed market analyst says it's time to buy the dip
links.description: J.P. Morgan is telling its clients to make the most of the market's massive sell-off this week, as it's almost over. The bank's widely followed analyst Marko Kolanovic said the dip was largely technical and followed the same selling template as the Dow's massive drop in February.

links.title: JP Morgan's widely-followed market analyst says it's time to buy the dip
links.description: Akos Stiller | Bloomberg | Getty Images J.P. Morgan is telling its clients to make the most of the market's massive sell-off this week as it's almost over. The bank's widely followed global derivatives analyst Marko Kolanovic, said the dip was largely technical and followed the same selling template as the Dow's massive drop in February.
